content.question: What does the letter writer express happiness about?

choices.label: Becoming captain of the soccer team
Doing well on her college entrance exams
Learning that the recipient is a soccer fan
Coming home to a bath and dinner

content.answer: Learning that the recipient is a soccer fan

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Interpret the distinguishing features of a text.
